fullText: Robert Hastie provides the frenzied “Mincemeat” direction. It forced someone behind me to whisper halfway through Act 1, “This is exhausting.” Nothing kills a laugh faster than seeing actors sweat.

keyPhrases.quote: Nothing kills a laugh faster than seeing actors sweat

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The review is overwhelmingly negative about the direction and performances, describing the production as exhausting and criticizing both the frenzied direction and sweating actors, with no positive elements mentioned. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses significant dissatisfaction with the direction and overall experience, indicating a clear rejection of the show.
